fields.c_desc: Memory check error
Low level memory calibration error
Bottom memory matching error
Low-level memory editing error
Low-level memory write error
Bottom memory motor data error

The internal 12V supply is abnormal, please confirm whether the control circuit connected to the controller and its potential are correct? The controller replacement test can be performed to verify whether it is caused by the controller or external factors?

Internal 5V The supply is abnormal, please confirm whether the control circuit connected to the controller and its potential are correct? A controller replacement test can be performed to verify whether it is a controller factor? Or an external factor?
The internal 5V supply is greater than the upper limit
The internal 5V supply is less than the lower limit
Switch input voltage is too high
Switch input voltage is too low
Accelerator high-end reference is abnormal, please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are consistent?
Memory write error
Memory address is out of range
The input of the accelerator sliding end is open. Please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are compatible?
The output potential of the accelerator is abnormal. Please replace it with a variable resistance accelerator and perform the test again?
The signal of analog input 1/2 It is greater than the set high threshold value (only applicable when Throttle Type is 2 or 5)
The signal of analog input 1/2 is less than its set low threshold value (only applicable when Throttle Type is 2 or  5)

The signal of analog input 1/2 is out of the normal range, please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are compatible? (Only applicable to the type with Throttle Type 0/1/3/4)

The resistance of analog input 1/2 is too high, please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are compatible? (Only applicable to the type whose Throttle Type is 0/1/3/4)

The resistance value of analog input 1/2 is too low, please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are compatible? (Only applicable to the type whose Throttle Type is 1/3)

The analog input 1 and the high reference terminal are short-circuited. Please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are compatible? (Only applicable when ISO test is set to Yes and three-wire 5KΩ, and Throttle Type is 1/3 of the type)

Analog input 1 and the low reference terminal are short-circuited, please check whether the related parameter settings and related wiring methods are compatible? (Only applicable when ISO test is set to Yes, and the Throttle Type is 1/3 type)
Accelerator dual channel signal comparison error

The motor phase current is too high, please check the motor wiring and insulation status? And confirm whether the relevant settings of Motor, Nameplate and Comissioning are consistent with the matching data of the adopted motor? Is the speed encoder pulse number setting correct?
The speed encoder signal is out of connection, please check whether the wiring is disconnected? Does the encoder specification match the controller?

The motor phase current is too high, please check the motor wiring and insulation status? And confirm whether the relevant settings of Motor, Nameplate and Comissioning are consistent with the matching data of the adopted motor? Is the speed encoder pulse number setting correct?
The electric brake circuit is short-circuited
The electric brake circuit is disconnected
The electric brake output side is abnormal
The voltage is too high
The internal converter voltage is too high
The main contactor main contact circuit is disconnected
The main contactor output is abnormal
Short circuit of main contactor main contact circuit
Short circuit of main contactor coil
The main contactor coil is disconnected
Internal watchdog check feedback error
Internal watchdog abnormal

If the current feedback is abnormal, it is recommended to replace the controller to confirm that this fault can be eliminated? The abnormal controller should be returned for inspection according to the method recommended by PG
Low-level program reorganization error
Direction switch input conflict
Speed limit 1 in action
Speed limit 2 in action
Speed limit 3 in action

Motor side voltage is too high; please check the motor and its wiring? And confirm whether the relevant settings of Motor, Nameplate and Comissioning are consistent with the matching data of the adopted motor? Is the speed encoder pulse number setting correct?
The voltage of the battery supplied to the controller is lower than 15V instantly; it is recommended to check whether the battery performance is poor? Or replace with a new battery for testing?
The voltage of the battery supplied to the controller is momentarily low; it is recommended to check whether the battery is already at a low water level? Recharge and test again
The battery has reached the Low Voltage Cut-Out set point
The voltage supplied to the controller is higher than 33V
The controller detects that the speed encoder signal is disconnected during driving; please check the encoder status or modify the setting of the parameter Encoder Signal Swap
Internal multiplexing processing Timeout

The controller detects that the accelerator/direction switch/interlock switch signal is turned on when it is turned on. Please use the programmer ADC view to view the status of these signals, or check the related line connection mode

The controller detects that there is an up or down switch signal input when it is turned on, please use the programmer ADC view to view the status of these signals, or check the related line connection
The voltage of the battery supplied to the controller is lower than 14V instantly; it is recommended to check whether the battery performance is poor? Or replace with a new battery for testing?
The battery voltage measured by the controller exceeds 35.5V for a moment, or the battery voltage side exceeds 40V for a moment; please check the battery status and related wiring
The voltage of the battery supplied to the controller exceeds 40V for an instant; please check the battery status and related wiring
Power supply attenuation contactor short circuit
Power supply attenuation contactor error
Power supply attenuation monitoring short-circuit error
Power supply attenuation monitoring disconnection error
ADC view data storage error
Unexpected failure, failure index invalid
Internal watchdog activation failure
Data sampling error

Invalid settings, the original file of programming settings does not match the version of the controller's underlying software. It is recommended to read the original settings from the controller and modify the settings one by one.
Invalid setting, it is recommended to change the accelerator type to 0/2/4/5, or choose analog input 1 (only applicable to the type whose Throttle Type is 1/3)
Invalid motor nameplate technical parameters; it is recommended to enter the correct motor data into the Nameplate parameter set
The motor circuit is disconnected, please check the motor status and related wiring connection
The motor circuit is short-circuited with the positive electrode of the battery, please check the motor status and related wiring connection
The motor circuit is short-circuited with the negative terminal of the battery, please check the motor status and related wiring connection
The multi-tasking process did not complete initialization at startup
The controller logic or operating system encounters abnormal disturbances, please check the status of the battery and motor and their wiring, or perform a controller replacement test
Communication loss

When the motor thermistor value reaches the Motor Thermistor Foldback setting value, the effective current of the controller will be linearly suppressed until the Motor Temperature Cut-Off set point; it is recommended to let the motor cool down before operating
The controller detects that the current limit Current Foldback Time condition is achieved; it is recommended to confirm that the relevant setting values are consistent with the application
The internal motor output phase voltage is too high
The travel motor driver enters the over-temperature current limit
The temperature of the travel motor drive is too high

When the motor thermistor value reaches the set value of Motor Temperature Cut-Off, the effective current of the controller will be suppressed to the matching value of Absolute Minimum Current; it is recommended to let the motor cool down before operating
not available
not available

fields.effect: K2 Main Contactor Open, Power Bridge opened,electromagnetic brake applied

fields.c_desc: F5 AC2 traction inputs is always driven low by AC2 Pump 1 F9 Output at startup. At Start up traction and pump carry out a sychronization process to cross check the correct operation of safety circuit. If the safety input of AC2 Traction is detected to be always hold, the K2 main contactor outputs and the electromagnetic brake coil disabled

fields.c_desc: Failure in the controller eeprom internal logic diagnosis
fields.effect: The controller works using default parameters

fields.c_desc: High Temperature in the controller
fields.effect: The performances are progressively reduced following linearly the temperature increase

fields.c_desc: Traction Motor high temperature
fields.effect: The maximum current is reduced linearly to 0 Amp

fields.c_desc: Battery is discharged
fields.effect: The maximum current is reduced to half

fields.c_desc: The deadman input is closed at the start OR it is opened when traction/hydraulics request are present
fields.restart_procedure: Release all the commands and apply the correct sequence

fields.c_desc: Forward and backward request are present at the same time
fields.restart_procedure: Release all the commands and apply the correct sequence

fields.c_desc: The alarm appear during the acquisition of current gains
Controller temperature device failed,Internal Logic diagnosis

The alarm appears when the controller detect a stall rotor condition due to real mechanical locking of rotor OR to a failure in the encoder feedback. When the condition is detected for more than 5 sec, then the fault condition is entered
fields.restart_procedure: Release and reapply the traction request

fields.c_desc: The AC2 controller recieves from the CAN the message that another controller in the net is in fault condition; as a consequence the traction controller itself cannot enter an operative status, but has to WAIT for the other controller coming out of the faults
fields.effect: It depends on type of fault of other controller
fields.restart_procedure: It depends, if for alarm of another node release all the commands and apply the correct sequence. Otherwise you wait or turn off

fields.c_desc: Mismatch between F10 Traction and F10 AC2 Pump 1 signals or between E7 of AC2 traction and F4 AC2 Pump 1 signals
fields.restart_procedure: System Resynchronized,release all the requests (traction and hydraulics) ,release the operator presence button,push the operator presence button, do an operation request(traction , hydraulic or both)

fields.c_desc: The temperature motor sensor diagnosed is broken
The value of the slip parameters of the traction motor are not correct. This alarm is very not likely to appear because these parameters are inserted by the producer and cannot be modified

fields.c_desc: The positive on K2 line contactor is removed, due to emergency button opening
fields.effect: K2 Main Contactor Open, Power Bridge opened,electromagnetic brake applied
fields.restart_procedure: System Resynchronized,release all the requests (traction and hydraulics) ,release the operator presence button,push the operator presence button, do an operation request(traction , hydraulic or both)

fields.c_desc: Voltage of battery is less than 57 volt for 80 volt battery, 38 volt for 48 volt battery
fields.effect: K2 Main Contactor Open, Power Bridge opened,electromagnetic brake applied
fields.restart_procedure: System Resynchronized,release all the requests (traction and hydraulics) ,release the operator presence button,push the operator presence button, do an operation request(traction , hydraulic or both)

fields.c_desc: The feedback of output driver NSAFETY (F9) is not consistent with the signal coming from the microprocessor
fields.effect: K2 Main Contactor Open, Power Bridge opened,electromagnetic brake applied
fields.restart_procedure: System Resynchronized,release all the requests (traction and hydraulics) ,release the operator presence button,push the operator presence button, do an operation request(traction , hydraulic or both)

fields.c_desc: Failure in the controller eeprom internal logic diagnosis
fields.effect: The controller works using default parameters

fields.c_desc: High temperature in the controller
fields.effect: The performance are progressively reduced following lineraly the temperature increases

fields.c_desc: Traction Motor high temperature
fields.effect: The maximum current is progressively reduced to 0A

fields.c_desc: The deadman input is closed at the start OR it is opened when traction/hydraulic request are present
fields.restart_procedure: Release all the commands and apply correct sequence

fields.c_desc: The alarm appears during the acquisition of the currrent gains
Controller temperature device failed, Internal logic diagnosis
fields.effect: The maximum current is reduced of half and the traction performance is affected

fields.c_desc: The alarm appears when the module detects a block condition in the rotor due to mechanical block or to a failure in the encoder motor feedback

The AC2 PUMP Controller recieves from the CAN message that traction controller is in fault condition; as a consequence the AC2 Pump Controller itself cannot enter an operative status, but has to WAIT for the other controller coming out of the fault condition
fields.effect: It depends on the type of fault of the other controller
fields.restart_procedure: It depends, if for alarm of another node: release all commands and apply the correct sequence  Otherwise you wait or tun off
